thread.section_title: Fine Rug Collection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Rug Collection | finerugcollection.com
thread.title: Kevin
thread.title_full: Fine Rug Collection reviewed by Kevin

author: Kevin
title: Kevin
text: I must admit that I was a little nervous about ordering fine carpets on-line, but I took a chance and did it because there was not anyone where I live that has such a selection. Anyway, I was pleasantly surprised that the carpets I ordered were exactly as advertised and will bring many years of pleasure and satisfaction to the home's interior. I will order from Fine Rug Collection in the future for any carpet needs. Thank you for the quick service and quality product.
